Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2011 05:39PM hoovergirl82 wrote: Thank you all for the warm welcome!  A few times I thought, what if I had had the mastectomy back in 2004 when I was first diagnosed?  There is no history of cancer in my family.  So I had 3 lumpectomies.  But doing the "what if" game only makes one even crazier. I need to find out what all these abbrevations stand for!  I try to never use them, but it is nice to figure out what they all mean!!
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Heard of This? hoovergirl82 3monstmama

Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2011 05:24PM hoovergirl82 wrote: Greetings. I just had my 5th of 6 taxotere treatments yesterday.  I feel like my hair is starting to grow back.  However, I am told I will continue to be having chemotherapy. My question is, for those of us who continue on chemo, will our hair grow back?  Should I invest in Minoxidil?  I take Biotin when I think of it.   I want my hair back! Thanks!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
